sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Deletes an existing namespace. This operation also removes all associated notificationHubs under the namespace.

Inputs :

  • Subscription ID - Unique ID of the subscription.
  • Resource Group Name - Name of the resource group.
  • Namespace - Name of the namespace.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Microsoft Azure Notification Hub, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Either Subscription ID or Resource Group or Namespace or Notification Hub or API Version entered is invalid or not found.
  • Either mismatch between properties or property values entered are invalid.
  • Requests beyond max requests that can be processed by available resources.

To use this action, the corresponding Microsoft Azure Notification Hub connection and credential must be created and associated with the Microsoft Azure Notification Hub Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Delete Namespace

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Deletes an existing namespace. This operation also removes all associated notificationHubs under the namespace.

Inputs :

  • Subscription ID - Unique ID of the subscription.
  • Resource Group Name - Name of the resource group.
  • Namespace - Name of the namespace.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Microsoft Azure Notification Hub, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Either Subscription ID or Resource Group or Namespace or Notification Hub or API Version entered is invalid or not found.
  • Either mismatch between properties or property values entered are invalid.
  • Requests beyond max requests that can be processed by available resources.

To use this action, the corresponding Microsoft Azure Notification Hub connection and credential must be created and associated with the Microsoft Azure Notification Hub Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.name: Delete Namespace
